alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 9:47AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gilchrist, northwestern Alachua, southwestern Union, southwestern Columbia and southeastern Suwannee Counties through 1030 AM EST... At 947 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bell, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Trenton, Bell, Ichetucknee Spring, Alachua, High Springs, Fort White, Upland Pines, Providence, Newberry and Hildreth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alachua; Gilchrist; Southern Columbia; Suwannee; Union; Western Alachua
